long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Seamlessly Send Web Articles to Your Kindle with To Kindle

Checkout the website: https://tokindle.onrender.com/
Checkout the Android App: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tokindle&pcampaignid=web_share

To Kindle is a must-have Chrome extension for avid readers and Kindle enthusiasts looking to blend their web browsing experience with their passion for reading. This powerful tool enables users to instantly extract articles from any webpage and send them directly to their Kindle device, ensuring their favorite content is always accessible.

Key Features:

> Effortless Article Extraction: With a single click, To Kindle smartly identifies the core content of an article, eliminating distractions like ads, popups, and irrelevant material. Enjoy a clean, focused reading experience tailored for your Kindle.

> One-Click Send to Kindle: Simplify your reading workflow with our one-click feature. After extracting the article, send it to your Kindle effortlessly. To Kindle takes care of the formatting and conversion, ensuring the article is perfectly optimized for your Kindle screen. It uses your Kindle device's email address to send the article to your Kindle

> Flexible Download Option: Prefer to read offline or on a different device? To Kindle also offers the option to download the article in EPUB format, giving you the freedom to read whenever and wherever you choose.

> All Kindlers know how much they love the cover of the book are a reading. To Kindle creates a cover for your extracted Article and it will be a new one every time.

> Designed for the modern reader: To Kindle bridges the gap between web content and your Kindle, transforming how you discover, save, and enjoy articles. Whether it's long-form articles, news stories, or blog posts, To Kindle delivers a seamless reading experience directly to your e-reader.

> Elevate your reading habits today with To Kindle Chrome Extension. Never miss out on great reads and keep your Kindle library enriched with content you love.

************

What's New: 

Send PDFs to your kindle in a single click!

************

Note: During installation to Kindle, you may see the information about requested permissions. Rest assured, I only collect the following necessary information:

Your email address: Used for login and account management.
Kindle devices' email address: Required to deliver content to your Kindle.
URLs of articles you send to Kindle and the relevant dates: This helps me improve the services and understand how you use the extension.

I do not collect any other personal browsing data.
I never sell your information.
I may offer subscription plans in the future for additional features or benefits.

By downloading and installing this extension, you agree to the Privacy Policy
